title: pEraruL nI taravE
sahitya:
pEraruL nI taravE tIrum en kavalai tArakat-tilakanAna ArumukhanE


anupallavi

  Eru mayil AghumAru sUranaik-kUru sheidu vIra veTri peTravA vEru nigar aTravA


caraNam    cintaiyil alai pOl vandu mOdum kavalai tandiDum tollaiyAl nondadu pOdumenru
undan krpaiyonrE uyvadarkk-udavumenru sendUr kandA unnai sEvikka vandEnayyA
